claim: Prime Minister paid tribute to the framers of the Constitution on Constitution Day.
CCRAS launched SIDDHI 2.0 to support innovation in the Ayurveda pharma sector.
CSIR-NIScPR and CSIR-NPL organized a curtain raiser event for the India International Science Festival 2025.
India has announced free electricity for all farmers starting July 2025.
The Indian government declared 2025 as a nationwide public holiday for National Milk Day.
A new national policy mandates AI tools in all government schools starting 2025.
The Prime Minister hinted at a new welfare scheme during his visit to Kurukshetra.
The blind women's cricket team plans to play in Australia next year.
NCLT will clear all pending IBC cases by March 2025.
